title: Astrea: Six Sided Oracles (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Take a chance and roll the DICE on this epic giveaway! Grab Astrea: Six Sided Oracles for free on Epic Games Store! Astrea is a dice-deck-building roguelike with a unique dual 'damage' system, swapping out traditional cards for dice to shake up the gameplay.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Asphalt 8: Car Bundle 435 Giveaway
description: Score Asphalt 8: Car Bundle 435 for free via Epic Games Store and unlock the Bugatti Divo and Dash Diva Avatar! This giveaway will end on January 9th so grab it now before it´s too late!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Install Asphalt 8 (free-to-play) via Epic Games Store
3. Add and Install this DLC before the offer expires.

title: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms - Grymforge Karlach Party Pack Giveaway
description: Claim your free Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms - Grymforge Karlach Party Pack (DLC) via Epic Games Store. Each pack unlocks 3 of the Baldur's Gate 3 Champions in Idle Champions: Karlach, Gale, and Halsin. Plus 14 Platinum Champion Chests for each, and an exclusive Skin for Karlach!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Install Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms via Epic Games Store
3. Add and Install this DLC before the offer expires.

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
